mapper.select: SELECT id, userId, impId, merchantId, applyNum, totalPay,createDate FROM orders WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT o.id , p.imgUrl, p.name, p.price, d.count, d.status FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN orders_detail d ON o.id = d.ordersId INNER JOIN product p ON p.id = d.productId INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = o.userId WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND o.id = #{ordersId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT b.count, p.price FROM basket b INNER JOIN product p ON b.productId = p.id INNER JOIN user u ON b.userId = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND b.id = #{basketId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(userId, impId, merchantId, applyNum,totalPay,createDate) VALUES(#{userId},#{impId},#{merchantId},#{applyNum},#{totalPay},now())
INSERT INTO orders_detail(ordersId, productId, count, status,createDate) VALUES(#{ordersId},#{productId},#{count},#{status},now())
